contact.leading: Reinvent data science with heterogeneous computation

landing.h4: Analytics Platform for Massive-Scale Geospatial and Temporal Data
landing.leading: Implements data visualization based on the massively parallel processing power and graphic rendering power of GPUs. Compared with traditional solutions, ZILLIZ Analytics has higher throughput, higher cost-effectiveness, and lower latency.

features.h2: Returns query results for billion-scale datasets in subseconds
features.f1P: ZILLIZ Analytics integrates traditional data analytics, modern data science, and intelligent workflow based on geospatial and temporal analytics into one open platform. Natively supporting SQL queries and visualized, interactive analytics, ZILLIZ Analytics is compatible with multiple mainstream machine learning models.
features.f2P: Thoroughly utilizing the parallel processing power of GPUs/CPUs, ZILLIZ Analytics can perform SQL queries and visualized, interactive analytics on massive datasets without any pre-processing, including indexing, pre-aggregation, and downsampling, etc.
features.f3P: ZILLIZ Analytics unites analytics between geospatial and temporal data to help you gain a panoramic view of time and location. With fine-grained visualization of geospatial and temporal datasets, you can both view the big picture and focus on every detail.

solution.leading: ZILLIZ Analytics implements data visualization based on the massively parallel processing power and graphic rendering power of GPUs. Compared with traditional solutions, ZILLIZ Analytics has higher throughput, higher cost-effectiveness, and lower latency. While significantly reducing the computation cost per unit, ZILLIZ Analytics can return query results for billion-scale datasets in subseconds.
solution.question: Question
solution.q1: As the data of vehicle operations and supply chain management grows fast, the logistics industry needs to make effective decisions as fast as possible to decrease fuel consumption, reduce maintenance cost, and increase vehicle utilization rate.
solution.s1: ZILLIZ Analytics empowers the logistics industry with the ability to analyze the whole supply chain, starting from the production line to the last kilometer in delivery. Data analysts can then analyze billion-scale datasets for vehicle operation and supply chain management in real time.
solution.el1-2: Optimized delivery routes by machine learning algorithms
solution.el1-3: Geospatial and temporal analytics of vehicle operations
solution.el1-4: Driver behavior monitoring in real time
solution.el1-5: Real-time vehicle maintenance based on vehicle condition
solution.q2: Massive-scale internet log files and sensor data keep flowing in the telecommunications network in real time. As the advent of 5G dramatically increases the quantity of data, the telecommunications industry needs to perform real-time data analytics to quickly discover and resolve network problems, thus effectively increasing the usability and reliability of the network.
solution.s2: ZILLIZ Analytics can visually display billion-scale datasets, thus empowering analysts in the telecommunications industry with new methods to perform network operations optimization, customer loss analysis, and research in modes and correlation among different datasets or geological locations.
solution.el2-1: Real-time network monitoring for onsite service and preventive maintenance
solution.el2-2: Knowledge about the history pattern of customer loss to establish a predictive machine learning model
solution.el2-3: Improved customer experience through geospatial analysis based on signal intensity

joinus.h2: ZILLIZ is growing. Come and join us!
joinus.h3: “Be Hero”的团队文化，致力于打造一支精干、战斗力强、勇于创新的队伍，提倡以数据为基础、系统化解决复杂问题的工作方法，鼓励学习，奖励创新。

landing.p: Next-generation OLAP analytics engine that uses the massively parallel processing power of GPUs to speed up SQL operations

features.learnMore: Learn more about how the GPU-accelerated analytics database speeds up your geospatial and temporal data analytics.

f1.p:
MegaWise supports standard SQL and PostgreSQL grammar. The following interfaces are provided for MegaWise:
- Command-line interface
- JDBC and ODBC

f2.p: MegaWise completely optimized the memory and the computing layer for the best performance. MegaWise builds 3 layers of cache in each physical node, including GPU video memory, main memory, and SSD, thus reaching the highest access speed.

f3.p: ZILLIZ builds a JIT compilation system based on LLVM in MegaWise. Currently, MegaWise can run with high efficiency in NVIDIA GPU, x64 CPU, POWER CPU, and ARM CPU.

f4.h4:
No complex indexing,
downsampling, or pre-aggregation
f4.p: MegaWise does not need indexing, downsampling, or pre-aggregation. With the support of GPUs, MegaWise can perform real-time queries for billion-scale datasets in tens or hundreds of milliseconds.

landing.p: Browser-based data visualization interface that provides visualized, interactive representations of massive-scale geospatial and temporal data in real time.

features.learnMore: Learn more about how Infini comprehensively visualizes massive-scale data in real time

f1.p: Completes all procedures from data query to graphic rendering in a flash for massive-scale geospatial and temporal data.

f2.p: Visually interacts with charts, tables, and maps. Any interactive operation will be reflected in your visualized interface in real time.

f3.p: Customizes multiple chart types. You can freely choose your favorite style.

f4.p: Renders billions of geospatial data on the map in a flash. Seamless merge with maps will add tremendous business value to data.
